message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.CR

The paper discusses a method for scientific publication recommendation, which is a common topic in the information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. The paper also mentions building a dataset in the computer science domain, which could fall under the categories of cybersecurity (cs.CR) or cybernetics (cs.CY). Additionally, the use of referenced publications as ground truth data could involve machine learning techniques (cs.DL).
